latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: Electrical/chemical/mechanical hazards observed at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Peeling lead-based paint or peeling paint of unknown lead content observed in child care facility at time of inspection At time of inspection it was determined that safe work practices were not employed during activity that potentially disturbed lead-based paint or paint of unknown lead content
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed that child care service failed to provide appropriate guards on designated structures/equipment to protect children from potential injury
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient number of toilets and sinks for the number of children in attendance
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hand wash sinks are not supplied with an adequate amount of running water At time of inspection water temperature exceeded 115 deg Fahrenheit
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Outdoor play area was observed not maintained nor free of hazards or nuisances at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service facility observed not maintained or in disrepair Dry sweeping observed in areas occupied by children
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to take any and all necessary action to eliminate potential hazards
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children
